# Publications `r knitr::asis_output("\U1F4C1")` 
A full list of my publications are available on:
[Google scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=LExTRNkAAAAJ&hl=es) and
[Mendeley profile](https://www.mendeley.com/profiles/marco-aurelio-gonzalez-tagle/).

My dissertation research, under the advisement of Prof. Dr. Burkhard Müller-Using and  Prof. Dr. Klaus von Gadow at the Georg August Universität Göttingen, focused on fire history in Nuevo León, Mexico. A copy of my dissertation can be found at the [German National Library](https://d-nb.info/977068498/34) or [E-diss Uni Göttingen](https://ediss.uni-goettingen.de/bitstream/handle/11858/00-1735-0000-0006-B169-5/gonzalez_tagle.pdf?sequence=1). \vspace[1cm]
